title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2601.10 - Acknowledgments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2601.10 - Acknowledgments

State Regulations

If the corporation does not provide or deny access to records
sought within five business days of receipt of a request, the corporation shall
furnish a written acknowledgment of receipt of the request and a statement of
the approximate date when the request will be granted or
denied. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2601.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
